titleStmt.title: Mr. William Sedgwicks letter to his Excellency Thomas Lord Fairfax, generall of the Parliaments forces, in prosecution of his answer to the remonstrance of the Army.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, William, 1609 or 10-1669?
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: A reply to a "second declaration" (A2r) by Fairfax and the Army, not identified.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decembr: 28 1648". The 9 in 1649 has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
